author: Brion Fallon
comment: Awesome shooter for wear. At times it can move a little too fast (for a game that requires you to cover the screen with your finger to control).  Graphics are simple polys, but with some imagination they are great.  I wish it went a little slower. Galaxy s5 with Moto360.
title: Sweet

author: Lee Weaver
comment: This is the type of game id like to see on wear. Needs powerups
title: Frantic and furious

author: Sean Machan
comment: No way!  I remember this game from my old windows ce pocket pc!  Awesome to play it again, but on my watch now!!

author: Jon E.
comment: It isn't the right orientation on my moto 360 watch. Can't play without uncomfortable twisting. :-/
title: Moto 360

author: benhero85
comment: The game orientation on the moto 360 is wrong. The game rotates your screen 90 degrees counter clockwise so the the bottom of the screen is where your home button is. Also it has an odd black bar on the right side of the screen.  If that gets fixed it will be a decent game!
title: Doesn't work well on moto 360

author: Ivan Lopez
comment: not correct orientation on Moto 360, such potential, missing power ups
title: Doesn't work well on Moto 360

author: Jacob Ramos
comment: This is an amazing app that really shows all that these watches can really do! One small thing is that there is no option to exit the app so you have to turn the screen off; if it were there I'd give it five stars, however I'm sure it will be out with updates! Overall I am impressed!!
title: Great app!

author: erik gui
comment: These watches have great potentially and this game really shows it.My only problem is that as far as I can tell,there is no way to pause or end the game other than dimming the watch.Other than that great game.
title: Awsome

author: Keon Parsa
comment: Just not a very fun game.
title: Good compatability.
